text:
Yesterday, Trump was asked what he would have done differently to avoid the U.S. accounting for 30% of the world's COVID-19 cases. 

His response: "Well, nothing."

The real answer: By acting earlier, he could have saved tens of thousands of lives. 

https://t.co/UhnAIz9MVP https://t.co/TkIicOXx8E
